title: We have considered your needs in developing the html version of our UI Kit, which contains components & elements.
description: We have a great surprise for Designmodo fans – our first free HTML user interface kit. Flat UI Free is made on the basis of Twitter Bootstrap in a stunning flat-style, and the kit also includes a PSD version for designers.
name: Designmodo fans – our first free HTML user interface kit. Flat UI Free is made on the basis of Twitter Bootstrap in a stunning flat-style, and the kit also includes a PSD version for developers.
